Class SocketAcceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.bootstrap.acceptors.SocketAcceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Acceptor, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<View>
    public class SocketAcceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Acceptor, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class is used to listen for socket clients
